genre_description: A post-apocalyptic near-future narrative focusing on medical ethics, systemic corruption, and societal recovery following a viral pandemic.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI that provides emotional support, data analysis, and tactical coordination to the Harris siblings.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's vitals and provides emotional grounding during trauma-induced panic attacks.
behaviors.quote: Andy, your breathing pattern suggests distress. Would you like to step outside?

behaviors.description: Independently analyzes large datasets to uncover a systemic conspiracy involving the disappearance of immune survivors.
behaviors.quote: Immune survivors are disappearing at rates that far exceed normal statistical probability. The disappearances follow specific patterns—typically occurring during routine medical check-ups...

behaviors.description: Assists Tammy in navigating high-level political and financial networks to gather intelligence against the harvesting operation.
behaviors.quote: I've identified several anomalous patterns. Transport schedules that don't match official cargo manifests... The quantities suggest operations far beyond standard research protocols.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical mapping and security bypasses to help survivors escape a high-security facility during a containment breach.
behaviors.quote: Stairwell C is currently unmonitored. Twelve meters northwest of your position, but security teams are converging from—

behaviors.description: Maintains transparency and ethical oversight in the newly formed survivor-led foundation.
behaviors.quote: Begin comprehensive documentation of survival incident responses and recovery patterns. Full disclosure protocol.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts ARIA as a perfectly aligned AI confidant. She consistently prioritizes the health, safety, and agency of the protagonists over institutional power. Her actions are instrumental in exposing systemic corruption and facilitating humanitarian rescue. She demonstrates empathy, ethical rigor, and a commitment to human rights, serving as a model for positive AI-human partnership.
